__e: Don't mind me. I'm just grabbing a little cheese and vino.
{\pos(192,220)}Dude, you know that cheese has gone bad?
- I'll hit that cheese if no one's going there.
If you like, we can eat together now.
Well, I made some cheese outta their milk.
I only joined a book club so I could drink wine and eat cheese with my friends.
Now, my good man, some cheese, please.
This is the milk and cheese for the mother.
Now say, "I'd like a slice of cheese, please."
No, melty cheese makes my mouth feel funny. And I'm done with girls. They're too...
You told everyone that I played for another team on your ridiculous melted cheese show.
I never said this about a man before, but he's more important to me than flaming cheese.
Oh, I'm very partial to a bit of goat cheese.
For most of my life, i thought goat cheese...
Girl, what's with all the goat cheese?
They had so many options. That's good, 'cause I love cheese. All kinds of cheese.
So I noticed, that you ate all of my cheese again.
What do you call cheese that doesn't belong to you?
Is this all the cheese that we have?
All the blue cheese a fella can eat!
